title: Train fault causing additional travel time on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL]CLEARED: Train service between Marina South Pier and MarinaBay are running normally now. Free bus service and bus bridging have ceased.
[NSL] Update: Train service has resumed. Free bus service is still available between Marina South Pier and CityHall station.
[NSL] Update: Train service has resumed. Bus bridging is available between Marina South Pier and Marina Bay.
NSL Train service has resumed from Marina Bay to City Hall. However, No train service between Marina Bay and Marina South Pier.
NSL Train service resumed from Marina Bay to City Hall. No train service to Marina South Pier.
[NSL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Marina South Pier to #RafflesPlace towards JurongEast due to train fault.
